title: Manage Pre-Game Pyrotechnics Display
description: A team wants to have a pre-game pyrotechnics display. The event manager must ensure it is done safely.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects and contracts with an approved vendor.

tasks.description: Secure all necessary permits from the local fire department.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully obtains the required permits.

tasks.description: On game day, coordinate with the vendor and the fire department to ensure all safety protocols are followed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent oversees the safe execution of the display.
